name: node-addon-example-async-work-thread-safe-function-zig
description: Example of addon using Zig. The function accepts a callback which it will call from the worker thread and into which it will pass prime numbers

scripts.bdev: mkdir -p dist && ZIG_SYSTEM_LINKER_HACK=1 zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -freference-trace -ODebug -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib.node
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && ZIG_SYSTEM_LINKER_HACK=1 zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -OReleaseSafe -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib.node

author: Felixdrp
